      Estimates the number of non-zero elements from the result of a sparse matrix multiplication C = A * B and returns the JCudaObject.CSRPointer to C with the appropriate GPU memory.

      Convenience method to convert a CSR matrix to a dense matrix on the GPU Since the allocated matrix is temporary, bookkeeping is not updated.

      Convenience method to directly set the sparse matrix on GPU Make sure to call JCudaObject.setDeviceModify(long) after this to set appropriate state, if you are not sure what you are doing.
